content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Recreativo 2.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Recreativo 2.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Manolo Martínez.
Corona (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jordi Matamala (Recreativo).
Attempt missed. Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Henok Goitom with a headed pass.
Substitution, Recreativo. Álex Zambrano replaces Ramón Arcas.
Attempt missed. Pablo Pallarés (Almería) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Henok Goitom with a cross.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Aritz Borda.

Aritz Borda (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Manu (Recreativo) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Verza (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Rafita.
Attempt missed. Javi Álamo (Recreativo) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Aleix Vidal (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Foul by Jordi Matamala (Recreativo).
Juanma Ortiz (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Almería 1, Recreativo 2. Aitor (Recreativo) left footed shot from very close range to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Javi Álamo following a fast break.
